subject: RE: [junit] upgrading to junit4: no test found
msgSnippet: In the meantime someone else pointed out the problem: I should no longer subclass TestCase. Then I saw myself  I forgot to remove the test prefix of one
messageBody:
In the meantime someone else pointed out the problem: I should no longer
subclass TestCase. Then I saw myself I forgot to remove the test prefix of
one annotated method. That gave me the false impression the transition
worked for one of the test classes.

Sorry to have bothered you.
